title: How to Use Right-Click on Steam Deck's Desktop Mode

steps.title: Enter Desktop mode.
steps.content: Enter Desktop mode. From the Steam menu, select Power , and then Switch to Desktop . [1] X Research source Similar to computers, right-clicks on Steam Deck's Desktop mode will open menus.

steps.title: Press L2 (left trigger).
steps.content: Press L2 (left trigger). If your cursor is on an open spot, the context menu will open. If your cursor is on a file, the file options will open. You can also tap the left trackpad to right-click.

steps.title: Launch Steam.
steps.content: Launch Steam . Enter Desktop mode and select the Steam icon from the desktop. This will be next to other downloaded games or applications, such as Google Chrome .

steps.title: Select Settings.
steps.content: Select Settings . This will be in the top-left corner. A new window will open.

steps.title: Select Controller.
steps.content: Select Controller . You can find this in the left panel, underneath Web Browser .

steps.title: Select Desktop Configuration.
steps.content: Select Desktop Configuration . This will be in the middle of the window.

steps.title: Assign a new key.
steps.content: Assign a new key. Select Right-click and press a new key to reassign it. If you want to customize your Steam Deck further, you can also change the display resolution .
